thumb.name: Children Do Not Realize
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMom.%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re Loved and Appreciated%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;Children Do Not Realize%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAs children.%3Cbr%3Ewe can%26#146;t comprehend%3Cbr%3Eor fully realize%3Cbr%3Ethe meaning of a mother%26#146;s love.%3Cbr%3Ehow tender and how wise %26#151;%3Cbr%3EHer patience and her guidance.%3Cbr%3Eher helpful. caring ways.%3Cbr%3Ethe special. thoughtful things%3Cbr%3Eshe does%3Cbr%3Eto brighten up the days %26#151;%3Cbr%3EYears go by before we know%3Cbr%3Ethe depth of her concern.%3Cbr%3Ethe love in her protectiveness %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eit takes so long to learn...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBut as we grow.%3Cbr%3Ewe understand.%3Cbr%3Efor we look back and see.%3Cbr%3EThrough older eyes and wiser hearts.%3Cbr%3Eher love and loyalty %26#151;%3Cbr%3EIt%26#146;s these and many other things%3Cbr%3Ethat make her grow more dear.%3Cbr%3EMore admired%3Cbr%3Eand appreciated%3Cbr%3Ewith every passing year.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re a wonderful mother.%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re a beautiful person.%3Cbr%3EYou listen with your heart.%3Cbr%3EYou%26#146;re always giving.%3Cbr%3EYou deserve the best.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Ewith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Rob%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Caring Mom
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor Patty.%3Cbr%3EWhose Friendship%3Cbr%3EMeans So Much%3Cbr%3Eto Me%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Warmest Wishes%3Cbr%3Eon Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBehind each wonderful story%3Cbr%3Eyou%26#146;ve shared%3Cbr%3Eabout motherhood and family life.%3Cbr%3EI see the loving. caring mom%3Cbr%3Eyou are.%3Cbr%3EI see the many things you do%3Cbr%3Eto enrich a child%26#146;s life%3Cbr%3Eand fill it with happiness.%3Cbr%3EAnd I feel fortunate%3Cbr%3Ethat such a kind%3Cbr%3Eand thoughtful woman%3Cbr%3Eis also my very good friend.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Eand Happiness Always%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Dear Grandmother...
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EDear%3Cbr%3EGrandmother%3Cbr%3EIn this busy world%3Cbr%3Ewhere time passes too quickly.%3Cbr%3EI'm not always able%3Cbr%3Eto be with you%3Cbr%3Eand talk with you%3Cbr%3Eas much as I want to...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EBut time never goes by%3Cbr%3Eso quickly%3Cbr%3Ethat I don't think of you%3Cbr%3Eevery day...%3Cbr%3E...and smile%3Cbr%3Eand feel glad%3Cbr%3Ethat you're my grandmother %26#151;%3Cbr%3Ebecause I love you%3Cbr%3Every much.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: A Wish for Happiness
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E'Today's a very special time%3Cbr%3Eto let a mother know%3Cbr%3EShe's always treasured%3Cbr%3Ein the hearts%3Cbr%3Eof those who love her so.'%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAll your love.%3Cbr%3Eall your caring.%3Cbr%3Eall your giving.%3Cbr%3Eall these years%3Cbr%3Eare the reasons%3Cbr%3Ewhy my heart%3Cbr%3Ethinks of you%3Cbr%3Eon Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Ewith a wish for happiness%3Cbr%3Eand a world full of love.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom David%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Beautiful Person Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;In caring heart and loving spirit.%3Cbr%3Ethere%26#146;s no one%3Cbr%3Emore beautiful than%3Cbr%3Emy wonderful Mother.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI wish%3Cbr%3Eyou could see yourself%3Cbr%3Ethe way I do. Mom.%3Cbr%3Ebecause if you could%3Cbr%3Eyou%26#146;d see%3Cbr%3Ewhat a beautiful person%3Cbr%3Eyou truly are.%3Cbr%3Eand why I feel so proud and lucky%3Cbr%3Eto have you%3Cbr%3Efor my mother.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Ewith Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Kate%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thank You. Mommy
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EDear Mommy.%3Cbr%3EThank you%3Cbr%3Efor tucking me in.%3Cbr%3Epicking me up.%3Cbr%3Eand showing me how.%3Cbr%3EThank you%3Cbr%3Efor teaching me%3Cbr%3Eto do things on my own.%3Cbr%3Eand believing in me%3Cbr%3Ewhen I try.%3Cbr%3EThank you%3Cbr%3Efor hugging me%3Cbr%3Eand loving me%3Cbr%3Eand doing special things%3Cbr%3Eto make me happy.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank you%3Cbr%3Efor being%3Cbr%3Ea wonderful%3Cbr%3Emommy.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Ewith Lots of Love%3Cbr%3Efrom Collin%3Cbr%3EXXXOOO%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: For a Wonderful Daughter
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3ELaura.%3Cbr%3Efrom%3Cbr%3EMom and Dad%3Cbr%3E%26#147;A daughter is a joy%3Cbr%3Eto the heart%3Cbr%3Eand a wonderful part%3Cbr%3Eof a family's warmth and love.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're that special kind%3Cbr%3Eof daughter%3Cbr%3Ewho does sweet%3Cbr%3Eand thoughtful things%3Cbr%3EAnd may not know%3Cbr%3Ethe happiness%3Cbr%3Eher kindness always brings... %3Cbr%3EYou're that special kind%3Cbr%3Eof daughter%3Cbr%3Eevery parent wishes for.%3Cbr%3EAnd although you%3Cbr%3Eseldom hear it.%3Cbr%3Ewe couldn't love you more.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: If Moms Ran the World
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETop Ten Things%3Cbr%3EThat Would Be Different%3Cbr%3Eif Moms Ran the World%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E10. All wars settled%3Cbr%3Eby pie-baking contests.%3Cbr%3E9. Failure to call your mother at%3Cbr%3Eleast once a week %26#151; 5 years in prison.%3Cbr%3E8. Sharp. conservative pantsuits all the%3Cbr%3Efashion rage with teenage girls.%3Cbr%3E7. Random checks for dirt behind the ears%3Cbr%3Epart of everyday life.%3Cbr%3E6. Mother%26#146;s Day changed to Mother%26#146;s Month.%3Cbr%3E5. Every Tuesday is Be-Embarrassed-%3Cbr%3Eby-Your-Mother Day.%3Cbr%3E4. Two words: 9:00 curfew.%3Cbr%3E3. Dirty fast-food joints replaced by%3Cbr%3Eclean. warm sit-down restaurants%3Cbr%3Ewhere they offer a nice. reasonably-priced%3Cbr%3Ecobb salad served by a clean-cut.%3Cbr%3Epolite young man. and the restrooms are%3Cbr%3Ealways kept spic and span.%3Cbr%3E2. Less Hip-Hop. more%3Cbr%3EPeter. Paul. and Mary.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd the Number One thing that would be%3Cbr%3Edifferent if Moms ran the world is...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E1. The world would just%3Cbr%3Ebe a nicer place to live.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E(If the other moms were all like you.%3Cbr%3Ethat is!)%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother%26#146;s Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Chuck%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Thank God for You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThank God%3Cbr%3Efor You. Mom%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EShe is a woman%3Cbr%3Eof strength and dignity...%3Cbr%3EWhen she speaks.%3Cbr%3Eher words are wise.%3Cbr%3Eand kindness is the rule%3Cbr%3Efor everything she says...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3EProverbs 31:25-26%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of all the things%3Cbr%3Ethat make you a wonderful mom.%3Cbr%3Eand thanking God%3Cbr%3Efor every one of them.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day. Mom.%3Cbr%3Ewith Love from Tom%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Grandma and Mom
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGrandma.%3Cbr%3EYou're a wonderful%3Cbr%3EMother and Grandmother%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom All of Us%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith loving thoughts and memories%3Cbr%3Eof the wonderful grandmother%3Cbr%3Eyou've always been.%3Cbr%3Ewith heartfelt gratitude%3Cbr%3Efor the special mother you are...%3Cbr%3E...and the warmest wishes%3Cbr%3Ethat you'll never forget%3Cbr%3Ehow much we treasure you.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're Always%3Cbr%3Ein Our Hearts%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Single Red Rose
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EFor My Beautiful Wife. Sandee. on Mother's Day The rose%26#133;a sign of sweet remembrance%26#133; an inner happiness more perfect and more beautiful than any words can express.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3ESandee. I love you because of all the things you are. because of all that I am when I 'm with you. and because you have shown me and Sam. Jake. and Alex. day after day. in countless ways. what love means%26#133;I love you. Sandee. with all my heart.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Look What I Got You Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMom.%3Cbr%3EFor Mother's Day.%3Cbr%3EI got you a card%3Cbr%3Ewith something%3Cbr%3Ereally great inside...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EME!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Mother's Day%3Cbr%3Efrom Devon!
